"""We were no more surprised than Rahman.""
options: We were less surprise than Rahman
Rahman was less surprised than us
We were as surprised as Rahman.

question: """Not once has neighbour invited us into his house.""
options: Our neighbour has never invite us into his house
Our neighbour has invited us in his house not once but many times
Occasionally our neighbour has invited us into his house.
Our neighbour has not always invited us into his house
answer: Our neighbour has invited us in his house not once but many times

question: Travellers____their reservation well in advance if they want to visit the St. Martins island.
After food has been dried or canned ___ for later consumption.
Despite being a brilliant scientist, he does not seem to get his ideas across.
What may be considered courteous in one culture may be arrogant in another.
Which of the word or words are wrong. Every man or women should vote their vote.

"""No news is good news"""
options: it is likely to have bad news
It is likely that we expect bad news
it is likely that nothing bad has happend
it is unlikely that nothing bad has happend
answer: It is likely that we expect bad news

question: A bird in hand is worth two in the bush.
options: The seen is better than the unseen
Take what you have readily available rather than expecting better in the future
It is no good beating about the bush.
answer: Take what you have readily available rather than expecting better in the future
